# Recap Time Squad Wiki

[![Inspired by GitLab](https://img.shields.io/badge/Inspired%20by%20GitLab%20Handbook-7759C2?style=flat-square&logo=gitlab)](https://handbook.gitlab.com/handbook/inspired-by-gitlab/)
[![Part of Lorebooks.wiki](https://img.shields.io/badge/lorebooks.wiki-008080?style=flat-square&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BPC9zdmc%2B)](https://lorebooks.wiki)

Welcome to our repository for the Recap Time Squad wiki, buitl with [Material for Mkdocs]
and hosted on [Cloudflare Pages], containing documentation about how we run
the organization, the humans behind it and the projects we run.

> [!NOTE]
> Came here from [the High Seas](https://highseas.hackclub.com) and looking for the
> `@recaptime-dev/meta-github` or even `@recaptime-dev/community-notes` /
> `@recaptime-dev/squad-notes`? They are at <https://github.com/lorebooks-wiki/community-notes> and <https://github.com/recaptime-dev/.github> respectively.

## Related projects

* [RecapTime.dev website](https://github.com/recaptime-dev/website) - our website in Material for Mkdocs!
* [Policies](https://mau.dev/recaptime-dev/legal/policies) - home of legal and community policies at RecapTime.dev

## Contributing to the wiki

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](./CONTRIBUTING.md) for details. By submitting patches,
you agree to [the Community Code of Conduct] and Linux DCO.

[Material for Mkdocs]: https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material
[the Community Code of Conduct]: https://policies.recaptime.dev/code-of-conduct
[Cloudflare Pages]: https://pages.cloudflare.com
